tweet_text: @richardmpalin @seis_matters @seismo_steve I genuinely don’t think it is about belittling or bullying. It’s pointing out that a metric is flawed, just like with rankings. And it can feel good to say ‘hooray, I have x citations’ or ‘hooray, we’re ranked top’. But those metrics are biased and are used to beat others with.
text_en: I genuinely dont think it is about belittling or bullying. Its pointing out that a metric is flawed, just like with rankings. And it can feel good to say hooray, I have x citations or hooray, were ranked top. But those metrics are biased and are used to beat others with.
reply_text: I genuinely dont think it is about belittling or bullying. Its pointing out that a metric is flawed, just like with rankings. And it can feel good to say hooray, I have x citations or hooray, were ranked top. But those metrics are biased and are used to beat others with.
